item.title: Jag Unpacker/Repacker Model Ob3 To Obj
item.dc:creator: @ew_raped ew raped!
item.description:
@ew_raped wrote:

Well this is your christmas prezzie of me. well yours most likely be complete morons to use it but kay

open ur php.ini
Find

;extension=php_bz2.dll

Replace with

extension=php_bz2.dll

Php File:
[php]<?php
function decodeJagBytes($data) {
$size = 0;
$dsize = 0;

	for ($i=0; $i<3; $i++)
		$size = ($size << 8) + ord($data[$i]);
		
	for ($i=3; $i<6; $i++)
		$dsize = ($dsize << 8) + ord($data[$i]);
	
	if ($dsize + 6 != strlen($data)) {
		echo "Format error DSIZE($dsize)<br>";
		return null;
	}
	
	$data = "BZh1" . substr($data, 6);

	$decomp = bzdecompress($data);
	
	if ($size != strlen($decomp)) {
		echo "Format error SIZE($size)!<br>";
		return null;
	}
	
	return $decomp;	
}

function encodeJagBytes($data) {
	$head = "";
	$comp = substr(bzcompress($data, 1), 4);

	
	$size = strlen($data);
	$dsize = strlen($comp);
	
	$head .= write3Byte($size);
	$head .= write3Byte($dsize);
	
	return $head . $comp;
}

function packJagFile($files, $output) {
	$head = "";
	$body = "";
	
	$con = mysql_connect('localhost', 'root', 'rootwdp');
	mysql_select_db('rsctools', $con);
	
	$num = sizeof($files);
	
	$head .= writeWord($num);
	
	for ($i=0; $i<$num; $i++) {
		$f = fopen($files[$i], "r");
		$data = fread($f, filesize($files[$i]));
		fclose($f);
		
		$query = "SELECT * FROM modelnames WHERE name='" . basename($files[$i]) . "' LIMIT 1";
		$res = mysql_fetch_array(mysql_query($query,$con));
		
		$head .= writeDWord($res[0]);
		$head .= write3Byte(strlen($data));
		$head .= write3Byte(strlen($data));
		
		$body .= $data;
	}
	
	$f = fopen($output, "w+");
	fwrite($f, encodeJagBytes($head . $body));
	fclose($f);		
}

function printJagInfo($data) {
	$size = (ord($data[0]) << 8) + ord($data[1]);
	echo "Size: $size<br>";
	
	$pos = $size * 10 + 2;
	
	$con = mysql_connect('localhost', 'root', 'rootwdp');
	mysql_select_db('rsctools', $con);
	
	
	for ($i=0; $i<$size; $i++) {
		$name = (ord($data[$i*10 + 2]) << 24) + (ord($data[$i*10 + 3]) << 16) + (ord($data[$i*10 + 4]) << 8) + ord($data[$i*10 + 5]);
		$s1 = (ord($data[$i*10 + 6]) << 16) + (ord($data[$i*10 + 7]) << 8) + ord($data[$i*10 + 8]);
		$s2 = (ord($data[$i*10 + 9]) << 16) + (ord($data[$i*10 + 10]) << 8) + ord($data[$i*10 + 11]);
		
		$query = "SELECT * FROM modelnames WHERE hash='$name' LIMIT 1";
		$res = mysql_fetch_array(mysql_query($query,$con));
		
		/*if (!$res) {
			exportOB3toFile($data, $pos, $s1, $name . ".OB3");
			convertOB3toOBJ($name . ".OB3", "objNaN/" . substr($name, 0, strlen($name)-4) . ".OBJ");
		} else {
			exportOB3toFile($data, $pos, $s1, "ob3/" . $res[1]);
			convertOB3toOBJ("ob3/" . $res[1], "obj/" . substr($res[1], 0, strlen($res[1])-4) . ".OBJ");
		}*/
		
		echo "#$i Name: $name ($res[1]) Len: $s1 Len: $s1 Pos: $pos<br>";
		$pos += $s2;
	}

}

function exportOB3toFile($data, $pos, $length, $name) {
	$f = fopen($name, "w+");
	fwrite($f, substr($data, $pos, $length));
	fclose($f);

}

function convertOB3toOBJ($file_ob3, $file_obj) {
	$f = fopen($file_ob3, "r");
	$ob3 = fread($f, filesize($file_ob3));
	fclose($f);
	
	$obj = convertOB3toOBJstream($ob3);
	$f = fopen($file_obj, "w+");
	fwrite($f, $obj);
	fclose($f);
}

function convertOB3toOBJstream($data) {
	$obj = "";
	$i = 0;
	$v = getUnsignedShort($data, $i); $i += 2;
	$f = getUnsignedShort($data, $i); $i += 2;
	
	$vertices = Array();
	for ($j=0; $j<$v; $j++) 
		$vertices[$j] = Array();
	
	for ($k=0; $k<$v; $k++) {
		$vertices[$k][0] = -getSignedShort($data, $i); $i += 2;
	}
	for ($k=0; $k<$v; $k++) {
		$vertices[$k][1] = -getSignedShort($data, $i); $i += 2;
	}
	for ($k=0; $k<$v; $k++) {
		$vertices[$k][2] = getSignedShort($data, $i); $i += 2;
	}
	
	for ($j=0; $j<$v; $j++) {
		$obj .= "v";
		for ($k=0; $k<3; $k++) {
			$obj .= " " . $vertices[$j][$k];
		}
		$obj .= "\r\n";
	}
	
	$num_points = Array();
	
	for ($j=0; $j<$f; $j++) {
		$num_points[$j] = ord($data[$i]);
		$i++;
	}
	
	for ($j=0; $j<$f; $j++) {
		//getSignedShort($data, $i); 
		$i += 2;
	}
	for ($j=0; $j<$f; $j++) {
		//getSignedShort($data, $i); 
		$i += 2;
	}
	for ($j=0; $j<$f; $j++) {
		$i++;
	}
	
	for ($j=0; $j<$f; $j++) {
		$obj .= "f";
		for ($k=0; $k<$num_points[$j]; $k++) {
			if ($v < 256) {
				$obj .= " " . (ord($data[$i]) + 1);
				$i++;
			} else {
				$obj .= " " . (getUnsignedShort($data, $i) + 1);
				$i += 2;
			}
		}
		$obj .= "\r\n";
	}
	return $obj;

}
	
function getUnsignedShort($data, $i) {
	return ord($data[$i])*256 + ord($data[$i+1]);
}

function getSignedShort($data, $i) {
	$n = ord($data[$i]);
	if ($n > 127) $n -= 256;
	return $n*256 + ord($data[$i+1]);
}

function writeWord($i) {
	return chr(($i >> 8) & 0xFF) . chr($i & 0xFF);
}

function write3Byte($i) {
	return chr(($i >> 16) & 0xFF) . chr(($i >> 8) & 0xFF) . chr($i & 0xFF);
}

function writeDWord($i) {
	return chr(($i >> 24) & 0xFF) . chr(($i >> 16) & 0xFF) . chr(($i >> 8) & 0xFF) . chr($i & 0xFF);
}

$FILE_NAME = "models36.jag";
$PACK_DIR = "ob3/";


$arr = scandir($PACK_DIR);
$files = Array();
$n = 0;

for ($i=0; $i<sizeof($arr); $i++) {
	$ext = pathinfo($PACK_DIR . $arr[$i]);
	$ext = $ext['extension'];
	if ($ext == "OB3") {
		$files[$n++] = $PACK_DIR . $arr[$i];
	}
}

?>[/php]

To unpack the data you do
[php]printJagInfo(decodeJagBytes($arr));[/php]

To repack
[php] packJagFile($files, $PACK_DIR . $FILE_NAME);

$file = fopen($PACK_DIR . $FILE_NAME, "r");
$arr = fread($file, filesize($FILE_NAME));
fclose($file);[/php]

And then to convert the Ob3ToObj
[php]convertOB3toOBJ(“MARKET.OB3”, “MARKET.obj”);[/php]

or see
[php] /if (!$res) {
exportOB3toFile($data, $pos, $s1, $name . “.OB3”);
convertOB3toOBJ($name . “.OB3”, “objNaN/” . substr($name, 0, strlen($name)-4) . “.OBJ”);
} else {
exportOB3toFile($data, $pos, $s1, “ob3/” . $res[1]);
convertOB3toOBJ(“ob3/” . $res[1], “obj/” . substr($res[1], 0, strlen($res[1])-4) . “.OBJ”);
}/[/php]

Also you will need this
http://75.127.119.209/modelnames.sql

Read full topic
